job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en implementeren van AI-agents die bedrijfsprocessen automatiseren en optimaliseren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development and implementation of AI agents, which are software components designed to automate and optimize business processes. This aligns with the definition of building and integrating software features.

job_tasks.phrase: Integreren van machine learning-modellen en NLP-technologie in de bestaande softwareoplossingen van KWEEKERS.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to integrating ML models and NLP technology into existing software solutions, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates hands-on work with specific AI technologies like GPT models, LangChain, and LangGraph, which falls under experimenting with and developing AI models and frameworks.

soft_skills.phrase: Meewerken aan het opbouwen van AI-expertise binnen KWEEKERS.
soft_skills.justification: This implies collaboration and knowledge sharing to build expertise within the company, fitting the definition of communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes the development and implementation of AI agents, integrating ML models and NLP, and specifically mentions experimentation with GPT models, LangChain, and LangGraph. This indicates a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (1.A.1) and specialized GenAI tasks (1.B.1), with a clear focus on generative AI technologies. The mention of building AI expertise also points towards a role that is hands-on with GenAI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly lists responsibilities and technologies related to AI development, particularly generative AI. The tasks align well with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile. However, it could be slightly more detailed on the 'software development & integration' aspect to be a perfect 5.
